ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode: def OnCMD_CONTAS_FINANCEIRASExecute(command, entity): import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes") from Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes.Financeiro import FNLancamentoCodigoInterno operacao = entity.Fields["OPERACAO"].Instance command.OutputDefinition.Parameters["ENTIDADEORIGEM"] = entity command.OutputDefinition.Parameters["CODIGOINTERNO"] = operacao.Fields["CODIGOINTERNO"].Value if entity.Fields["BLOQUEADOLIBERADO"].ToString() == "LIBERADO": command.OutputDefinition.Parameters["SOMENTELEITURA"] = True else: command.OutputDefinition.Parameters["SOMENTELEITURA"] = False
